bibl.title: Semitic Papyrology in Context. A Climate of Creativity. Papers from a New York University Conference Marking the Retirement of Baruch A. Levine. (Culture and History of the Ancient Near East. 14.)
bibl.note: Conference held as part of the Edleman Lectures, New York University, 5-7 March 2000. - Pp. vii-viii: L.H.S., Preface; - 257-273: Baruch A. LEVINE, Epilogue.

SCHIFFMAN Lawrence H. (Ed.), Semitic Papyrology in Context. A Climate of Creativity. Papers from a New York University Conference Marking the Retirement of Baruch A. Levine. (Culture and History of the Ancient Near East. 14.)
Leiden, E.J. Brill, 2003, 4°, xiv-285 pp., tabl., figg. ISBN 90-04-12885-9. €94.
